content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
The Isabelle release train continues with the next release candidate: I will
make the snapshot from the isabelle-dev repository on Mon 10-Feb-2025 11:00
(Bavarian time).

This is no repository fork yet --- I am mostly waiting for AFP to join the
release process.

Makarius

From: Gerwin Klein via isabelle-dev <isabelle-dev@mailman.proof.cit.tum.de>

On 9 Feb 2025, at 22:02, Makarius <makarius@sketis.net> wrote:

The Isabelle release train continues with the next release candidate: I will make the snapshot from the isabelle-dev repository on Mon 10-Feb-2025 11:00 (Bavarian time).

This is no repository fork yet --- I am mostly waiting for AFP to join the release process.

The AFP tends to fork very late, I was planning to start when RC2 is out.

Cheers,
Gerwin

From: Gerwin Klein via isabelle-dev <isabelle-dev@mailman.proof.cit.tum.de>

On 9 Feb 2025, at 22:02, Makarius <makarius@sketis.net> wrote:

The Isabelle release train continues with the next release candidate: I will make the snapshot from the isabelle-dev repository on Mon 10-Feb-2025 11:00 (Bavarian time).

This is no repository fork yet --- I am mostly waiting for AFP to join the release process.

The AFP tends to fork very late, I was planning to start when RC2 is out.

Cheers,
Gerwin

From: Gerwin Klein via isabelle-dev <isabelle-dev@mailman.proof.cit.tum.de>
Hi Burkhart,

Yes, the by the end of 12 Feb is still fine, I havenâ€™t forked yet and can wait for a day.

Cheers,
Gerwin

On 11 Feb 2025, at 02:25, Burkhart Wolff <burkhart.wolff@universite-paris-saclay.fr> wrote:

Hi Gerwin,

Is it still possible to update the AFP dev (in particular HOL-CSP, HOL-CSPM, HOL-Opsem)
Tomorrow night ?

It would help us a lot if we can push the current status of our development such we can get it
In AFP25. Subsequent modules depend substantially on a changed interface.

Sorry for the slight delay.

Best

Bu

On 9 Feb 2025, at 23:08, Gerwin Klein via isabelle-dev <isabelle-dev@mailman.proof.cit.tum.de> wrote:

On 9 Feb 2025, at 22:02, Makarius <makarius@sketis.net> wrote:

The Isabelle release train continues with the next release candidate: I will make the snapshot from the isabelle-dev repository on Mon 10-Feb-2025 11:00 (Bavarian time).

This is no repository fork yet --- I am mostly waiting for AFP to join the release process.

The AFP tends to fork very late, I was planning to start when RC2 is out.

Cheers,
Gerwin

From: Gerwin Klein via isabelle-dev <isabelle-dev@mailman.proof.cit.tum.de>
Thanks this looks fine. The last build seems to have failed, but not on your sessions.

Cheers,
Gerwin

On 13 Feb 2025, at 07:56, Burkhart Wolff <burkhart.wolff@universite-paris-saclay.fr> wrote:

Dear Gerwin,

We updated the four Sessions
- HOL-CSP
- HOL-CSPM
- CSP_RefTK
- HOL-CSP_OpSem

Additionally, we changed the meta-data for the HOL-CSP session:
Benoit Ballenghien became co-autor.

I hope this will not produce any problems.
Apparently, this will be updated tomorrow.

Best regards,

Burkhart

On 10 Feb 2025, at 16:25, Burkhart Wolff <burkhart.wolff@universite-paris-saclay.fr> wrote:

Hi Gerwin,

Is it still possible to update the AFP dev (in particular HOL-CSP, HOL-CSPM, HOL-Opsem)
Tomorrow night ?

It would help us a lot if we can push the current status of our development such we can get it
In AFP25. Subsequent modules depend substantially on a changed interface.

Sorry for the slight delay.

Best

Bu
